attributes.action: Provide healthcare professionals on COVID wards adequate PPE
attributes.additional_details: It is inhuman to expose the NHS staff to such risks
attributes.background:
Provide healthcare professionals on COVID wards minimum FFP2 masks, face shields and adequate shoe and clothing protection. 

The surgical mask provided at the moment does not protect the individual in a high risk environment.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational matter for the NHS
